channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AR

item.title: Report E-2023090363
item.description:
Report E-2023090363

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-02
  • City: WEST MEMPHIS
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.

item.title: Report E-2023090325
item.description:
Report E-2023090325

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-18
  • City: BENTON
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: HERITAGE TRANSPORT, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: While unloading the van trailer, technicians discovered that a drum of methyl methacrylate had polymerized. Some material vented from the drum and solidified as expanded foam on top of the drum and on the side of the drum. The solidified material and polymerized drum were repackaged.

item.title: Report X-2023081404
item.description:
Report X-2023081404

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-11
  • City: LITTLE ROCK
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO HAZMAT LEAKER ON THE TWILIGHT SORT. LEAKING PACKAGE WAS ON THE FLOOR SET ON SIDE. RESPONDER FOLLOWED DECISION TREE AND CORROSIVE RESPONSE SHEET FOR PROPER PPE AND CLEAN UP. PACKAGE AND ALL CONTENTS PLACED IN DMN TRAY TO BE TAKEN TO DMN AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
